specialization.title: Specialized Mentoring by Professional Profile or Business Concept Consulting
specialization.subtitle: All our 1, 2 or 3-hour sessions adapt to your specific profile within the gastronomic industry and/or your business concept. Our training and coaching mentorships will be configured and focused on your reality so you can make the most of using this suite of artificial intelligence-powered tools useful for restaurant owners, executive/corporate chefs, restaurant managers or directors, team leaders in general in hospitality and the restaurant industry.

step1.title: Book Your Session
step1.description: Select the plan that best fits your needs and reserve your spot in our calendar. Our recommendation is to initially hire one hour. If more sessions of 2 or 3 hours are needed, we can evaluate it together so you can better take advantage of the time and knowledge you can acquire

step2.title: Complete the Pre-Session Questionnaire
step2.description: You will receive a form to complete 48 hours before the session so we can prepare specifically for your needs.

step3.title: Personalized Session
step3.description: We connect via video conference for the consulting session, where we will develop specific strategies for your business.

step4.title: Implementation and Follow-up
step4.description: You will receive a detailed action plan and complementary resources. We include follow-up to ensure results.

question1.question: Do I need to have an active AI Chef Pro subscription?
question1.answer: Yes, you need to have an active account on AI Chef Pro to take full advantage of the consultation. We recommend at least the Pro plan to access most of the functionalities we will work with during the session.

question2.question: What platform is used for consultations?
question2.answer: We use Google Meet for consultation sessions, which allows us to share screen, record the session (if you wish) and have fluid communication. You will receive a personalized link after confirming your reservation.

question3.question: How do I prepare for the session?
question3.answer: We will send you a complete questionnaire 48 hours before the session. To make the most of it, we recommend having clear objectives, access to your AI Chef Pro account, and any relevant business data (current menus, cost information, etc.).

question4.question: What is the cancellation policy?
question4.answer: You can reschedule your session up to 24 hours in advance at no additional cost. Cancellations with less than 24 hours notice are subject to a 50% charge. If you need to cancel, contact us as soon as possible to find the best solution.

question5.question: Do you offer a satisfaction guarantee?
question5.answer: Yes, we offer a complete satisfaction guarantee. If at the end of the first 30 minutes of the session you consider that you are not receiving the expected value, we will refund 100% of the amount.

question6.question: Can I request a consultation for a very specific topic?
question6.answer: Absolutely. In the preliminary form you can detail exactly what specific aspects you want to work on, whether it's a specific AI Chef Pro tool or a particular challenge in your business.

final_cta.title: Book Your Online Mentoring Now
final_cta.description: Select the type of session you prefer and find the perfect time to boost your business with AI Chef Pro. Make the most of artificial intelligence in your daily routine.

free_consultation.title: Not sure which package to choose?
free_consultation.description: Schedule a free 15-minute micro-session to discuss your needs and determine the best option for your business.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about AI Chef Pro
faq.q1: What does AI Chef Pro include?
faq.a1: AI Chef Pro includes 55+ specialized applications for gastronomy professionals, covering everything from culinary creativity to business management and digital marketing.
faq.q2: Can I use AI Chef Pro if I'm a beginner?
faq.a2: Absolutely. Our tools are designed for all skill levels, from culinary students to Michelin-starred chefs. Each application includes detailed guides and examples.
faq.q3: How does the free trial work?
faq.a3: You can access our basic plan for free with limited functionalities. To access all tools and features, you can upgrade to any of our paid plans at any time.
faq.q4: Do recipes adapt to different portion sizes?
faq.a4: Yes, all our applications include intelligent scaling systems that automatically adjust ingredients and techniques according to the number of diners.
faq.q5: Does it include support for dietary restrictions?
faq.a5: Yes, our tools can generate recipes adapted to allergies, intolerances, and specific diets (vegan, gluten-free, keto, etc.).
faq.q6: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
faq.a6: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your user panel. There are no permanence commitments or cancellation fees.
